A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: An EXCELLENT strike down of my childhood's favorite story and the future of the saga. SUPERB display of deus ex machina. UNMATCHED demonstration of dropped plot lines and poor dialogue. TRIUMPHANT in its ability to destroy some of the most popular characters in the history of cinema. \n\nI'm afraid I agree with Mark Hamill when he said\, \"I told Rian\, 'I fundamentally disagree with virtually everything you've decided about my character.'\"
